description.english: Jack fits in with the guys

description.spanish: Jack se hace un sitio entre los chicos
description.schinese: 杰克和同事们打成一片
description.brazilian: Jack se dá bem com o pessoal

description.french: Jack accepte d'acheter la protection de Fry.
description.italian: Un Jack accondiscendente accetta di pagare per la protezione di Fry

description.japanese: おとなしく金を払ってフライの保護を受ける
description.polish: Jack posłusznie zapłacił za ochronę Frya
description.brazilian: Jack obedientemente compra a proteção do Fry

description.english: Jack figures out why he's here
description.german: Jack findet eine neue Aufgabe für sich
description.french: Jack découvre pourquoi il est ici.

description.koreana: 이곳에 온 이유를 알게 된 잭
description.spanish: Jack descubre por qué está aquí
description.schinese: 杰克弄清楚了他为什么在这
description.polish: Jack zdał sobie sprawę z tego, co tu robi
description.brazilian: Jack entende o motivo de estar aqui

description.english: Jack wins the competition with Carter
description.german: Jack gewinnt den Wettbewerb mit Carter
description.french: Jack remporte la compétition contre Carter
description.italian: Jack ha la meglio nella sfida con Carter
description.spanish: Jack gana la competición con Carter
description.schinese: 杰克在与卡特的竞争中获胜
description.russian: Джек побеждает в соревновании с Картером
description.japanese: カーターとの競争に勝つ
description.polish: Jack zwyciężył w pojedynku z Carterem
description.brazilian: Jack vence a competição com Carter

description.english: Jack takes an official position in the Sheriff's Department

description.french: Jack obtient une position officielle au commissariat.
description.italian: Jack assume un incarico ufficiale al Dipartimento dello Sceriffo
description.spanish: Jack asume un puesto oficial en el departamento del sheriff
description.schinese: 杰克在警察局获得了正式职位

description.japanese: 保安官事務所で正式な肩書きを手に入れる
description.polish: Jack objął oficjalną funkcję w biurze szeryfa
description.brazilian: Jack assume uma posição oficial na delegacia

description.german: Jack bringt Colonel Henderson zum Schweigen
description.french: Jack fait taire le colonel Henderson.
description.italian: Jack mette a tacere il colonnello Henderson
description.schinese: 杰克让亨德森上校闭上了嘴
description.japanese: ヘンダーソン大佐の口封じをする

description.english: Take down all the gangs in Sharpwood

description.french: Éliminer tous les gangs de Sharpwood.
description.italian: Elimina tutte le gang di Sharpwood
description.spanish: Acaba con todas las bandas de Sharpwood
description.schinese: 剿灭了尖木镇的所有帮派
description.japanese: シャープウッドのすべてのギャングを解散に追い込む
description.polish: Rozpraw się ze wszystkimi gangami w Sharpwood
description.brazilian: Acabe com todas as quadrilhas de Sharpwood

description.french: Mettez votre sniper derrière les barreaux
description.italian: Metti il tuo cecchino dietro le sbarre
description.spanish: Mete a tu francotirador entre rejas

description.brazilian: Coloque seu atirador atrás das grades

description.english: Send an innocent person to prison

description.english: Make Kevin Penkin a great cop with 1000 professionalism points

description.french: Faire atteindre 1000 points de professionnalisme à Kevin Penkin.
description.italian: Fai diventare Kevin Penkin un agente modello con 1000 punti professionalità

description.russian: Сделать из Кевина Пенкина копа с 1000 очков профессионализма

description.polish: Spraw, by Kevin Penkin stał się świetnym gliną i zdobył 1000 punktów profesjonalizmu
description.brazilian: Torne Kevin Penkin um ótimo policial com 1000 pontos de profissionalismo

description.english: Get rid of a wounded cop with the help of Dr. Kanayan

description.schinese: 借卡纳彦医生的帮助除掉一名负伤的警察

description.japanese: カナヤン先生の力を借りて負傷した警官を始末する
description.polish: Pozbądź się rannego policjanta przy pomocy doktora Kanayana
description.brazilian: Livre-se de um policial ferido com a ajuda do Dr. Kanayan

description.english: Complete five tactical missions without killing anyone

description.brazilian: Complete cinco missões táticas sem matar ninguém
